What ismail health care?

  1. Why do I need Mail Helth Care?

    Prescription drug prices are not regulated. The cost of a prescription may differ by more than $100 between pharmacies across the street from each other!

    Insurance isnâ€™t helping like it used to. In the past 10 years, insurance companies started passing 25-80% more of the cost of drugs onto patients.

  2. How can Mail Helth Care help me?

    Mail Helth Care- gathers current prices and discounts to help you find the lowest cost pharmacy for your prescriptions.
